author: Special Correspondent
text:
The water wing of the Border Security Force has found yet another abandoned fishing boat in Sir Creek area, Arabian sea in Kutch, Gujarat. The abandoned boat appears to be of Pakistan origin.

Last month, the BSF found two such boats from Sir Creek Area, a disputed creek between India and Pakistan.

This is the fifth such boat the BSF has found in Kutch, which shares border with the neighbouring country.

“Prima facie it seems to be a fishing boat and there was no suspicious material found on it,” said a BSF official.
title: Another Pak. boat found in Kutch
